title: Udemy - Insights into the entrepreneur mind
description:
Description
In this course I talk about the insights of the entrepreneur mindset, including:

    Captain Contrarian, do what others will not so you can then live the life others cannot.
    Play the long term game, it is the only game worth playing.
    Are entrepreneurs born or made? An interesting thought experiment.
    Paradox of perceived competition, why having a business is not as risky as working for someone else.
    Being an automaton, where you have automation built in from the start.
    Becoming von Goethe, when 1+1=5.
    Watch out for the White Rhino, an interesting effect seen in business and with entrepreneurship.
    Building a cathedral, where you have to see the bigger picture.
    We work together, to form masterminds, synergy and more!

Who is the target audience?

    Those that know little about entrepreneurship.
    The person that appreciates financial freedom.
    When you don’t know what to do with your life.
    A person who realises whether their life is on track, or not.
    A person that has realised being an entrepreneur is right for them.

Requirements

    Be an entrepreneur.
    Realise that there is more to life than working a 9-5.
    Beginning their journey as an entrepreneur.
    Be able to get started as an entrepreneur now.
    The capability to expand your comfort zone and increase your knowledge

parsed.dn: Udemy - Insights into the entrepreneur mind
parsed.name: Udemy - Insights into the entrepreneur mind
